about_the_game:
Roma Incognita is a thrilling stealth tactics game that takes place in the late Roman Republic. You will assume the role of Capiton Valerius, a veteran legionnaire who must fight to save his family and take revenge on those who betrayed him. Together with a team of specialists, each with their own unique abilities, you will sneak your way through cities, country villas, and enemy camps hidden in the woods, setting traps, and avoiding detection. With a variety of difficulty settings and special replay challenges, Roma Incognita offers countless ways to overcome any obstacle and succeed in your mission.



Key Features:
  • Play as five unique characters, each with a special set of skills.
  • Experience true freedom of choice: countless ways to overcome any obstacle.
  • Defeat large groups of enemies through careful planning and execution.
  • Take in the splendor of the Roman Republic, such as ancient cities, mountains, rich country villas, and more.
  • Choose between non-lethal and lethal attacks, stealthy and lightning-fast weapons.
  • Tweak the game to your own style with a variety of difficulty settings and special replay challenges.
  • Pause mode allows you to pause the game at any time and respond to ambushes or surprise attacks.
